General.Name: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited
General.Description: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; household appliances; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, decoration, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO Co., Ltd.

4.Name: Ms. Sangeun  Son
